com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol

Interface SmcProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SmcDevice

    public interface SmcProvider
extends SmcDevice
    This interface supports content provider management.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  SmcProvider.EventListener
      This listener interface provides callback methods for SmcProvider content provider events.
      static interface  SmcProvider.ResponseListener
      This listener interface provides the callback methods for response events.
      static class  SmcProvider.SearchCriteria
      This class contains the search criteria used in the search method.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol.SmcDevice

        DOMAIN_LOCAL_NETWORK, DOMAIN_MY_DEVICE, DOMAIN_REMOTE_NETWORK, DOMAIN_UNKNOWN, TYPE_AVPLAYER, TYPE_IMAGEVIEWER, TYPE_PROVIDER, TYPE_UNKNOWN

    • Method Detail

      • getRootFolder

        SmcItem getRootFolder()
        Get the root folder item of the content provider.
        Returns:
        The root folder of the content provider.

      • isSearchable

        boolean isSearchable()
        Check if the content provider supports searches.
        Returns:
        • true - if the content provider supports searching for content.
        • false - if the content provider does not support searching for content.

      • isUploadable

        boolean isUploadable()
        Check if content can be uploaded to the content provider.
        Returns:
        • true - if the content provider supports content upload.
        • false - if the content provider does not support content upload.

      • search

        void search(SmcProvider.SearchCriteria searchCriteria,
          int startIndex,
          int requestCount)
        Search for items with the specified criteria, starting index and count.

        The response for this method is returned asynchronously using SmcProvider.ResponseListener#onSearch(SmcProvider, List, int, int, SearchCriteria, boolean, int).

        Parameters:
        searchCriteria - The item containing the search criteria for which this method seeks to find matches. Set to null to search all the content.
        startIndex - The offset starting from zero from which the search starts.
        requestCount - The number of items to return that match the search criteria. The maximum number is 200.

      • browse

        void browse(SmcItem parentFolderSmcItem,
          int startIndex,
          int requestCount)
        Get the list of items in the folder from the specified starting point and for the number of specified items.

        The response for this method is returned asynchronously using the SmcProvider.ResponseListener.onBrowse(SmcProvider, List, int, int, SmcItem, boolean, int).

        Parameters:
        parentFolderSmcItem - The folder containing the items that you want to retrieve.
        startIndex - The offset starting from zero from which the browse method starts to retrieve files.
        requestCount - The number of items you want to retrieve. The maximum number is 200.

      • setResponseListener

        void setResponseListener(SmcProvider.ResponseListener listener)
        Set the specified ResponseListener instance to receive response events.
        Parameters:
        listener - The ResponseListener instance for receiving response events. Set to null to unregister the current listener.

      • setEventListener

        void setEventListener(SmcProvider.EventListener listener)
        Set the specified EventListener instance to receive content provider events.
        Parameters:
        listener - The EventListener instance for receiving content provider events.

      • upload

        void upload(SmcItem smcItem)
        Send the specified content to the content provider.

        The response for this method is returned asynchronously using SmcProvider.ResponseListener.onUpload(SmcProvider, SmcItem, int)

        Parameters:
        smcItem - The item you want to send to the content provider.

        Exceptions:

        • UnsupportedOperationException - Thrown if uploading is not supported.

      • uploadCancel

        void uploadCancel(SmcItem smcItem)
        Cancel sending the specified item to the content provider.

        The response for this method is returned asynchronously using SmcProvider.ResponseListener.onUploadCancel(SmcProvider, SmcItem, int)

        Parameters:
        smcItem - The item you do not want to upload to the content provider.

        Exceptions:

        • UnsupportedOperationException - Thrown if uploading is not supported.
